subject: p19389041
History: -year-old female patient with lung mass, status post bronchoscopic fiducial marker placement, evaluate for possible pneumothorax.
Findings: AP single view of the chest has been obtained with patient in sitting semi-erect position. There exists extensive thickening and calcified scar formations in both apical areas. No evidence of pneumothorax is present. In comparison with the next preceding chest examination of, no significant interval change can be identified. The left-sided hilar mass is present as before.
